Action.author: rickr
Action.body: Blocking issue for TLS HLJSDK ~Clayton Sims ~mastersingh24 ~bmos299 ~jimthematrix

Action.author: rickr

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 run.out has the logs it shows peer and orderer are not communicating

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: Found issue was with which CA_ROOT certs were used and needed to have a common signing certificate.
